html:
10.24.21  4:43 pm   what's your favorite question that someone's asked you on here?

      this one

10.24.21  4:41 pm   What is the first letter of the next song?

      i

10.24.21  2:52 pm   Do you ever miss your old editing program?

      no. it sucked

10.24.21  11:31 am   yesterday i got pizza from a place i never went to, and they use the same font you use in your videos on their pizza boxes. this unsettles me. can i do anything about it?

      my first instinct is to suggest that you make your own pizza business with your own pizza boxes and choose the font

10.24.21  11:07 am   What is the structure of your song, "more than a Dream"
(i.e, verse, chorus, bridge,)? 

      how about this:
     verse
     verse
     chorus
     verse
     chorus with a twist
     verse
     section 3
     chorus
     fake verse

10.24.21  10:32 am   theoretically, can bricks be green?

      yes

10.24.21  10:07 am   thoughts on carrot muffins

      fake

10.24.21  7:11 am   what does everyone get wrong about you?

      a lot of people think that videos are created during the upload process

10.24.21  4:34 am   today i made a new friend and im afraid we've peaked

      everything has peaked. but don't worry, it's going to peak again. the previous peak was not even the first

10.24.21  3:08 am   how do i show others i'm unique

      if what you say is true, then i couldn't possibly imagine

10.24.21  1:31 am   any advice for someone who suddenly isn't getting much joy out of things they typically enjoy?

      try some non-typical things

10.24.21  1:13 am   how hard was OhYeah Corp. hit by COVID?

      not at all. that's not on earth

10.24.21  12:50 am   i have no songwriting inspiration because the only things i can seem to write about are the only two things that bbother me ever. please give me a subject to write abbout so i dont go kookoo crazy wild

     here's a twin pack:
     
     increased
     might
     

     also, i sent you a question roughly two years ago and thought it was so cool for you to respond. cant find it though

10.24.21  12:10 am   how deep does the bill wurtz lore go

      put it this way, at some point you're probably gonna see screen recordings of me making a keyboard shortcut for making a keyboard shortcut

10.23.21  11:31 pm   hi i have no one to talk to ab this but ive been feeling and acting pretty shit lately but mom and sister do not get tired of me, is that love

      love is many things and yep that's one of them

10.23.21  11:26 pm   ever considered doing remakes of your old songs?

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

10.23.21  11:12 pm   hi bill, did Sigmund froid have any say in your newest song, or did you just place him on the back burner?

      neither

10.23.21  10:58 pm   what portions of your newest song were written in which year,

     all of it was written this week, in 2021

     also what is the time where you are when replying, if you decide to

      Sunday, October 24, 2021 5:30:47 PM

10.23.21  10:09 pm   How are your mixes literally perfect

      i must have hypnotized you into thinking it's perfect. this is the only way to get a good mix

10.23.21  9:32 pm   why don't you use capital letters

      i do, but why don't you

10.23.21  9:15 pm   what's your favourite thing to put on toast?

      your favorite music albums

10.23.21  9:09 pm   How much knowledge is too much knowledge?

      all of it

10.23.21  8:14 pm   What do you think of the internet today?

      seems legit

10.23.21  7:41 pm   Have you finished writing the lyrics for the next song?

      no

10.23.21  7:37 pm   is the world flat

      it used to be but now it's a little bent

10.23.21  7:09 pm   why are some of the answers on this page so deep

      i live in a hole

10.23.21  6:06 pm   Do you have any tips?

      contextually, yes. if you can say what you'd like tips on, i'm pretty sure i can come up with something

10.23.21  6:03 pm   what would you tell someone learning about making music?

      i'd be interested in hearing what they have to say about it first

10.23.21  5:17 pm   Are you God?

      i thought you were

10.23.21  5:16 pm   What is music in one sentance? 

      it's capable of supercharging a sentence

10.23.21  2:33 pm   Have you ever felt like "yeah that was the best thing i've ever made" or "i can't get better than that"?

      no. i'm always surprised at how much worse it seems compared to what i think i can do

10.23.21  1:54 pm   what is your opinion on country music that is specifically from america

      i have a different opinion for each song. more specific than that, i have a different opinion for each moment of each song. more specific than that, i have a different opinion for each different mood i may be in, each time i hear each moment of each song

10.23.21  1:45 pm   How did you find the chords in "It's a long, long, long way, it's a long, long strong way"

     intuition, and experimentation

     and what are they?

      approximately
      G#min7  F#/B  F#add4/D#  F#sus2/F
     Ebsus2add4  Ebmaj7/G  Fmin7  Ebadd4/C
     however, i suspect on the final recording the bass didn't have time to obey all of that, because party time

10.23.21  1:35 pm   do you beleive in gravity?

      yes, but i still don't understand it

10.23.21  12:16 pm   where do i travel to compose a melody

      somewhere new

10.23.21  11:53 am   were these videos that you've released recently this year, were they actually made in chronological order or were they made in separate times? (as in, you made 'money' before 'here comes the sun' or the other way around between any of these 4 recent videos)

      'money' and 'more than a dream' were made in the order they were released. "i'm a princess" was somewhat out of order. the song recording for that was finished in april 2019, and the first 1/3 of the video was mostly created in may 2019. the rest was done in in 2021. 'here comes the sun' was produced entirely in late 2020 into january 2021, except the songwriting was mostly done in 2010 and 2012

10.23.21  11:51 am   is music an acronym

      i don't see why not

10.23.21  11:11 am   how do you react when someone recognizes you?

      say it wasn't me

10.23.21  9:10 am   When did you finish the song for more than a dream?

     september 5, 2021

10.23.21  8:54 am   how do i start doing something?

      you either won't know until you've already started, or, you'll first decide what the thing is

10.23.21  7:32 am   Do you think you could write a book

      yes but in today's day and age i would not do it. instead, i'd use a lot of audio/visual content, and indeed i'd also use a lot of textual written content, but i wouldn't put it on paper. i'd put it on the computer/internet

10.23.21  2:09 am   Ever thought of doing photography as a hobby?

      yes

10.23.21  1:31 am   We are just a product of our environment and our environment is a product of the Big Bang so do we have any free will?

      yes

10.22.21  11:05 pm   I want to improve at life. Do you have any tips?

      yes. start identifying what you think it means to be good at life

10.22.21  11:02 pm   why did non-euclidean geometries become so popular in the 19th century?

      hipsters

10.22.21  9:39 pm   What's the meaning behind the blue and green rings in the "more than a dream" video?

      aesthetics

10.22.21  9:21 pm   Why do some countries drive on the left, but others on the right?

      maybe it's because Britain, who drives on the left, *influenced* some of the countries. and the reason Britain drives on the left is, maybe, because they used to fight each other with their right hand, while on their horses while driving past each other. i don't know if any of this is actually true. i'm just guessing

10.22.21  8:29 pm   sorry for the sad question, but how do you cope with loneliness?

      i'm not sure

10.22.21  7:22 pm   At what point do you consider a problem unsolvable

      i'll never know for sure

10.22.21  6:22 pm   how do you know what to include and what to exclude in your projects?

      include everything! nevermind, that probably won't work..........
